descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#000000][size=3][b][i]Turns the warrens in Markarth into Black Market Style Place,
No longer it is place for sick and poor,[/i][/b][/size][/color][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#000000][size=3][b][i]now it is real Underground Black Market.
[/i][/b][/size][/color][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#000000][size=3][b][i]
[/i][/b][/size][/color][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#000000][size=3][b][i]The Black Market is architecturaly in Velothi style.

[/i][/b][/size][/color][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#000000][size=3][b][i]It has many segments : From vampire sleeping Chamber,Shrine to Nocturnal,to little Caffe Shop.[/i][/b][/size][/color][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#000000][size=3][b][i]
[/i][/b][/size][/color][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#000000][size=3][b][i]Here you can also buy some egsotic weapons,Skooma,Sujjama etc.
[/i][/b][/size][/color][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#000000][size=3][b][i]
[/i][/b][/size][/color][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#000000][size=3][b][i]Check the pictures for more informations.[/i][/b][/size][/color][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#000000][size=3][b][i]
[/i][/b][/size][/color][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#000000][size=3][b][i]
[/i][/b][/size][/color][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#000000][size=3][b][i]
[/i][/b][/size][/color][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#000000][size=3][b][i]Credits :
[/i][/b][/size][/color][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#000000][size=3][b][i]Phitt for Architecture
[/i][/b][/size][/color][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#000000][size=3][b][i]Elianora,Oaristys,K13ran64,Strotti,Lor And Insanity for Clutter
[/i][/b][/size][/color][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#000000][size=3][b][i]Nickorasu for Nocturnal Painting and Stained Glass.[/i][/b][/size][/color][/font]
author: ibrica15
